amendment.description: Amendment clarifies language concerning the use of funds by the EPA related to the Kyoto Protocol.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a proviso which specifies that any limitation imposed under the Act on funds made available by the Act for the EPA shall not apply to activities specified in the proviso related to the Kyoto Protocol which are otherwise authorized by law.

action.text: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Olver. (consideration: CR H4824-4841, H4863; text: CR H4824

vote.text: On agreeing to the Olver amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 314 - 108 (Roll no. 301).
